page.title: 12Shobrooke Park.
page.content: Recreation. Dr. Sir Jack Shelley has all sorts of sports at Shobrooke Park. The type of sports are: Windsurfing takes place on the second lake and is run as a commercial venture, and is taught by an Australian. Fishing-the kind of fish you can catch are (Tench, Carp and Mirror Carp) and to go fishing you have to have a (PERMIT.Shobrooke Sports are a local school tornament. The Cricket Club is also on the Shobrooks Park grounds and is open to everybody. Walking is a leisurely sport and often taken with a dog (Sadly three sheep have been killed by dogs). Picnicking and courting are two other sports.
